subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Carlos Beltrán hit a two-run homer in the ninth, his second of the game, to finish off the Mets’ scoring and make Orlando Hernández a winner for the first time since July 28.
snippet: Carlos Beltrán hit a two-run homer in the ninth, his second of the game, to finish off the Mets’ scoring and make Orlando Hernández a winner for the first time since July 28.
